channel.title: Error in PI
channel.description: Hi, I am new to this community and i have come here with really high hopes, Please Help, I am getting this error when i try to run my server: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionIInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFformatException: For input string: "13539 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(integer.java.492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(integer.java.527) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadshops(ShopHandler.java:146) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:46) Press Any Key To Continue... [/code] Any Help Would Be Highly Appreciated... PS: It would be better if you dont tell me to use skype or teamviewer etc. as i dont have them. Thank You,

item.title: Error in PI
item.dc:creator: @sidi.p sidi.p
item.description:
@sidi.p wrote:

Thanx Alot Guys,
Error Resolved…

Read full topic

item.title: Error in PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s in the shops.cfg
Look for the string: 13539
There’s a space instead of a tab.
That’s what Vain’s been saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Error in PI
item.dc:creator: @sidi.p sidi.p
item.description:
@sidi.p wrote:

Vain_:

ShopHandler loads the shop file. The shop file contains the input string 13539 followed by a space. When ShopHandler parses the shop file, it splits the data by the ‘/t’ (tab) character. The file contains a space and is throwing an error.

So how exactly do i fix it? shall i reload my shophandler?

Or does it have something to do with shops.cfg ?
cos honestly i have not edited shophandler…

Read full topic

item.title: Error in PI
item.dc:creator: @sidi.p sidi.p
item.description:
@sidi.p wrote:

Hi, I am new to this community and i have come here with really high hopes, Please Help,
I am getting this error when i try to run my server:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionIInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFformatException: For input string: "13539 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(integer.java.492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(integer.java.527) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadshops(ShopHandler.java:146) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:46) Press Any Key To Continue...
Any Help Would Be Highly Appreciated…
PS: It would be better if you dont tell me to use skype or teamviewer etc. as i dont have them.
Thank You,

Read full topic
